blockquote.strong: This resource is still undergoing development and review by the appropriate Workgroups. At this time, is considered only as a draft resource not suitable for production implementation

div.p: Material used in the preparation of a medicinal/pharmaceutical product

The ingredient is part of a Medicinal Product, either alone or in combination with other ingredients. The ingredient is also a component of a pharmaceutical product. Ingredient is equal to a substance with the indication of the specific role it is playing in the product.
